itemInfo.itemDesc: A Trade Item containing 10 planks of Acacia Timber.

item.name: Acacia Timber
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Stonetail Wasteland. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Acacia Trees.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
